title: Berlin Nöldnerplatz station
text: Berlin Nöldnerplatz is a <a href="railway%20station">railway station</a> in the <a href="Rummelsburg">Rummelsburg</a> quarter of the <a href="Lichtenberg">Lichtenberg</a> borough in <a href="Berlin">Berlin</a>. It is served by the <a href="Berlin%20S-Bahn">S-Bahn</a> lines , and . The station is located on the eponymous square named after the <a href="Communism">Communist</a> and <a href="German%20resistance%20to%20Nazism">resistance</a> fighter <a href="Erwin%20N%C3%B6ldner">Erwin Nöldner</a>, killed in 1944, who lived nearby.
